languages.text: {n}Кровожадно взрыкнув, гигант сжимает чудовищные кулаки.{/n} "Брось еще одно надменное слово в сторону Фенриса, и мы выйдем на поединок. Не испытывай милость Всеотца — даже из безоружной схватки со мной тебе вряд ли удастся выйти жив{mf|ым|ой}".

{n}With a menacing roar, Ulfar clenches his monstrous fists.{/n} "One more insolent word about Fenris and we will have ourselves a duel. Do not test my mercy further — even unarmed, I will end your feeble life."
languages.original_text: {n}Кровожадно взрыкнув, гигант сжимает чудовищные кулаки.{/n} "Брось еще одно надменное слово в сторону Фенриса, и мы выйдем на поединок. Не испытывай милость Всеотца — даже из безоружной схватки со мной тебе вряд ли удастся выйти жив{mf|ым|ой}".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a menacing roar, Ulfar clenches his monstrous fists.{/n} "One more insolent word about Fenris and we will have ourselves a duel. Do not test the mercy of the Allfather — even without weapons, you are unlikely to escape alive from a clash with me."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}With a menacing roar, Ulfar clenches his monstrous fists.{/n} "One more insolent word about Fenris and we will have ourselves a duel. Do not test the mercy of the Allfather — even without weapons, you are unlikely to escape alive from a clash with me."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}With a menacing roar, Ulfar clenches his monstrous fists.{/n} "One more insolent word about Fenris and we will have ourselves a duel. Do not test the mercy of the Allfather — even without weapons, you are unlikely to escape alive from a clash with me."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}With a menacing roar, Ulfar clenches his monstrous fists.{/n} "One more insolent word about Fenris and we will have ourselves a duel. Do not test my mercy further — even unarmed, I will end your feeble life."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法发出了充满威胁意味的咆哮，握紧了他那可怕的拳头。{/n}“要是你再敢对芬里斯说一句无礼的话，我们之间就要爆发一场决斗了。别再考验我的仁慈，就算我没有武器，也能轻易结束你孱弱的性命。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a menacing roar, Ulfar clenches his monstrous fists.{/n} "One more insolent word about Fenris and we will have ourselves a duel. Do not test my mercy further — even unarmed, I will end your feeble life."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法发出了充满威胁意味的咆哮，握紧了他那可怕的拳头。{/n}“要是你再敢对芬里斯说一句无礼的话，我们之间就要爆发一场决斗了。不要考验全父的仁慈，就算我没有武器，你恐怕也无法从我的手里活着逃脱。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Con un rugido amenazador, Ulfar aprieta sus inmensos puños.{/n} «Otra palabra más sobre Fenris y tendremos que batirnos en duelo. No ponga más a prueba mi misericordia: incluso sin armas, acabaré con usted».
languages.original_text: {n}With a menacing roar, Ulfar clenches his monstrous fists.{/n} "One more insolent word about Fenris and we will have ourselves a duel. Do not test my mercy further — even unarmed, I will end your feeble life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un rugido amenazador, Ulfar aprieta sus inmensos puños.{/n} «Otra palabra más sobre Fenris y tendremos que batirnos en duelo. No ponga a prueba la misericordia del Padre de todas las cosas: incluso sin armas, es poco probable que sobreviva a un combate conmigo».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}威嚇するような唸り声とともに、ウルファーは巨大な拳を握る。{/n}「フェンリスを侮辱するような言葉を一度でも言ったら、決闘だ。全知の父の慈悲を試すな…丸腰であっても、その弱々しい人生を終わらせるぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}With a menacing roar, Ulfar clenches his monstrous fists.{/n} "One more insolent word about Fenris and we will have ourselves a duel. Do not test my mercy further — even unarmed, I will end your feeble life."

traits.locale_text: {n}威嚇するような唸り声とともに、ウルファーは巨大な拳を握る。{/n}「フェンリスを侮辱するような言葉を一度でも言ったら、決闘だ。全知の父の慈悲を試すな…丸腰であっても、その弱々しい人生を終わらせるぞ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Mit einem bedrohlichen Brüllen ballt Ulfar seine monströsen Hände zu Fäusten.{/n} "Noch ein anmaßendes Wort über Fenris und wir tragen ein Duell aus. Beansprucht meine Gnade nicht weiter – selbst unbewaffnet werde ich Euer kümmerliches Leben beenden."
languages.original_text: {n}With a menacing roar, Ulfar clenches his monstrous fists.{/n} "One more insolent word about Fenris and we will have ourselves a duel. Do not test my mercy further — even unarmed, I will end your feeble life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem bedrohlichen Brüllen ballt Ulfar seine monströsen Hände zu Fäusten.{/n} "Noch ein anmaßendes Wort über Fenris und wir tragen ein Duell aus. Stellt die Gnade des Allvaters nicht auf die Probe — selbst ohne Waffen würdet Ihr einen Kampf mit mir wohl kaum überleben."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Avec un rugissement intimidant, Ulfar serre ses monstrueux poings.{/n} « Encore un mot de travers envers Fenris et nous devrons nous battre en duel. À l'avenir, je vous déconseille de remettre ma miséricorde à l'épreuve. Même sans arme, je mettrai fin à votre misérable existence. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a menacing roar, Ulfar clenches his monstrous fists.{/n} "One more insolent word about Fenris and we will have ourselves a duel. Do not test my mercy further — even unarmed, I will end your feeble life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un rugissement intimidant, Ulfar serre ses monstrueux poings.{/n} « Encore un mot de travers envers Fenris et nous devrons nous battre en duel. Ne comptez pas sur la miséricorde du Père de Tous. Même sans arme, vous ne sortirez pas {mf|vivant|vivante} d'un combat contre moi. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}With a menacing roar, Ulfar clenches his monstrous fists.{/n} "One more insolent word about Fenris and we will have ourselves a duel. Do not test my mercy further — even unarmed, I will end your feeble life."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, tehditkâr bir kükremeyle kocaman yumruklarını sıkıyor.{/n} "Fenris'le ilgili küstahça bir laf daha edersen çekişmemiz başlar. Merhametimi daha fazla zorlama. Acınası hayatını silahsız da bitirmesini bilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}With a menacing roar, Ulfar clenches his monstrous fists.{/n} "One more insolent word about Fenris and we will have ourselves a duel. Do not test my mercy further — even unarmed, I will end your feeble life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, tehditkâr bir kükremeyle kocaman yumruklarını sıkıyor.{/n} "Fenris'le ilgili bir küstahça laf daha edersen düellomuz başlar. Merhametimi daha fazla zorlama. Acınası hayatını silahsız da bitiririm ben."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
